name: Dungeon: walls within walls
description:
Trapped into the nightmare with no rhyme or reason. Cornered into the labyrinth  with no  exit in sight. What will you do to escape the trap of the dungeoun inside out?  

What ending is in store for you?

This is a small introspective adventure for connoisseurs of obtuse puzzles and point-and-click games

P.S. This game is probably best enjoyed in one sitting (2-2.5 hours). It does have an autosave feature (it saves every so often during gameplay + when you quit to main menu), but the programming on that is somewhat unreliable
